EmailTemplate.name: Whitepaper-Nurture15.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join VMTurbo for a live demonstration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Managing the virtualized environment of today is significantly more complex than just keeping the plates spinning. There are important business needs and goals that must be met:
- Assure continuous performance for all applications—especially business-critical ones - Make the best use of the physical infrastructure because it directly affects operating costs - Develop a forward-looking cost/benefit analysis for hardware refresh, higher VM density, and infrastructure growth
VMTurbo offers bi-weekly webinars with a live demonstration of VMTurbo Operations Manager in a group setting that allow you to explore how we can help you address these challenges. Sign up <http://www.vmturbo.com/events/vmturbo-bi-weekly-live-demo-series/> for one today. If you’d prefer a one-on-one experience with one of our support engineers, you can schedule a demo <http://go.vmturbo.com/request-a-demo.html>.
Thank you,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=VMTurbo Team}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=edit me}} phone: {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=(781) 373-3540}} email: {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=sales@vmturbo.com}} Marketo, Inc. 901 Mariners Island Blvd., San Francisco, CA, 94404
Contact Us <#>
